context: EA is a major game publisher with EA Sports FC (formerly FIFA), Madden, The Sims, Battlefield, and Apex Legends. The company focuses on live services and mobile gaming.

competitors.name: Activision Blizzard (Microsoft)
competitors.notes: Call of Duty publisher now owned by Microsoft

competitors.name: Take-Two Interactive
competitors.notes: GTA, NBA 2K, and Zynga mobile games

competitors.name: Nintendo
competitors.notes: First-party Nintendo games and Switch platform

competitors.name: Tencent
competitors.notes: World's largest gaming company by revenue
